div: To begin, display a spectra by selecting the menu InterSpec → Import , or more conveniently, by dragging and dropping the file of interest directly onto the graph into the corresponding box as a "Foreground," "Background," or "2nd Foreground". A foreground must be loaded before either the background or 2nd foreground will be displayed.

You can display additional spectra at the same time by dragging and dropping them in as background or 2nd foreground types. You can also import files via InterSpec → Manager and then selecting File or Previous....

The Manager window also allows you to remove any additional spectrums by selecting the file(s) listed in the window so that it is highlighted, then selecting the Unload option on the bottom of the window.

You can also use the Manager to upload a spectrum as a "Foreground," "Secondary," or "Background" spectrum by clicking the spectrum so that it is highlighted and choosing the corresponding classification when selecting Assign As; This can also be done in the Spectrum Files tab in the bottom tool tabs by using the drop down menus to select which spectrum(s) will display as "Foreground," "Secondary," or "Background."
